subject: Plus X pedals
description_text:
Hello,       I purchased a set of your plus x pedals and have been having trouble with connectivity.  The pedals are amazing but unfortunately I think my hub is going bad? Is there a way i could get a new one? I'll attached a few photos. My computer will OFTEN not read these and drop signal mid race, I've even tried running a "no interference" adapter that helped some but still continues to disconnect. Thank you for any help!




:Dylan Cote 31 beechwood road Oakdale, CT 06370

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Dylan Cote,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
